name: Lion
description: Lions, the mighty kings of the animal kingdom, have golden fur and loud roars.

name: Deer
description: A deer is a large wild animal that eats grass and leaves. A male deer usually has large, branching horns.

name: Elephant
description: Elephants are the world's largest land mammals, with males weighing up to six tonnes on average

name: Horse
description: Horse have four powerful legs, two eyes, a nose, ears and a tail.

name: Monkey
description: Monkeys are very agile and intelligent animals. Monkeys are intelligent and playful, They can jump from one tree

name: Cheetah
description: The cheetah is an animal of the cat species.

name: Zebra
description: Zebras are herbivorous animals that belong to the equine family,.

description: Foxes are small to medium-sized, omnivorous mammals belonging to several genera of the family Canidae.

name: Cow
description: A cow is a large female animal that is kept on farms for its milk

name: Camel
description: Camel is called Ship of Desert.

name: Crocodile
description: Crocodiles have four legs, two eyes, and a thick tail.

name: Rabbit
description: A rabbit is a small animal with long ears.

description: The peacock is one of the most unique-looking birds in the world.

description: Hummingbirds, which are little, colourful birds.

name: Giraffe
description: Giraffe is the tallest animal.

name: Aardvark

name: Badger
description: Fierce burrowers, honey and insect enthusiasts.

name: Bear
description: Bears are solitary animals, considered as the most asocial among all carnivoras.

description: Belugas are small, toothed whales.

name: Chimpanzee

name: Dingo
description: The Dingo is Australia's wild dog.

description: Dolphins are considered one of the world's most intelligent animals,

name: Flamingo

name: Gorilla

description: Kangaroos are four marsupials from the family Macropodidae.

description: Koala, tree-dwelling marsupial of coastal eastern and southern Australia.

name: Narwhal
description: Narwhals are a species of whale with a horn.

name: Orangutan

name: Otter
description: Otters are very energetic and playful.

name: Panda

name: Polar Bear
description: Polar bear, great white northern bear found throughout the Arctic region.

name: Rhinoceros
description: Rhinoceroses are large, heavy animals.

name: Seal
description: Seals are a group of three families and 33 species of web-footed aquatic mammals.

description: Sloths live in the tropical forests of Central and South America.

name: Wolf
description: wolf, any of two species of wild doglike carnivores.

name: Baboon
description: Baboons belong to a large family of Old World monkeys

name: Buffalo
description: Buffalo is one of the most useful animals in the world.

name: Blue Jay
description: Vibrantly colored bird with blue and white plumage, often found in North America.

description: A bison is a large bovine in the genus Bison within the tribe Bovini.

name: Barracuda
description: A predatory fish known for its sleek, torpedo-shaped body and sharp teeth.

name: Albatross
description: The albatross is an exceedingly large seabird, having a wingspan as much as 11 feet across.

name: Cobra
description: Venomous snake known for its hood.

name: Condor
description: They are the largest flying land birds in the Western Hemisphere.

name: Lizard
description: Lizards are part of a group of animals known as reptiles.

name: Alligator
description: An alligator, or colloquially gator, is a large reptile in the Crocodilia order in the genus Alligator of the family Alligatoridae.

name: Sheep
description: Sheep is a domestic animal.

name: Frog
description: Frogs are small animals that can jump very well

name: Raccoon
description: On the prairies, raccoons are most abundant in woodlot and wetland areas.

description: The coyote is a species of canine native to North America.

name: Goat
description: Goat is a useful and a domestic animal which was tamed by humans from a very long time.

name: Pig
description: A pig is a medium sized animal having pink, grey or brown skin.

name: Salamander

name: Skunk

name: Anaconda
description: AThe green anaconda is the largest snake in the world,

description: Octopuses are sea animals famous for their rounded bodies, bulging eyes, and eight long arms.

name: Duck
description: Ducks are generally smaller and shorter-necked than swans and geese,

name: Python
description: Pythons are constrictors.

description: Rhinoceroses are large, heavy animals with thick gray or brown skin, short legs, and one or two horns on their nose.

name: Crab
description: Crabs are animals that live in water.

description: tiny fishes that are named for the shape of their head, which looks like the head of a tiny horse.

name: Platypus

description: Kingfishers are generally brightly colored birds that often fish for their food.

description: Whales are large animals that live in water

description: JThe grizzly bear, also known as the North American brown bear or simply grizzly.

name: Ant
description: Ants are small insects that are found throughout the world.

description: Spiders are air-breathing arthropods that have eight legs,

description: JBees are winged insects closely related to wasps and ants,

description: The Tasmanian devil is a carnivorous marsupial of the family Dasyuridae.

description: A sparrow is an omnivorous bird.

name: Parrot
description: The parrots are a broad order of more than 350 birds.

description: Eels are teleost fish.

description: Ostriches are large flightless birds.

name: Lemur

name: Turtle
description: A turtle is a reptile that has a shell covering its body.

name: Axolotl
description: The axolotl is a kind of salamander found only in Mexico City, Mexico.

description: The quokka's range is a small area of southwestern Australia.

name: Donkey
description: The donkey is a domesticated equine.

name: Glaucus atlanticus
description: Found throughout the Atlantic, Pacific, and Indian Oceans in tropical and subtropical waters,

name: Hamster
description: Hamsters are stout-bodied, with a tail much shorter than their body length,

name: Leopard
description: The leopard is one of the five extant species in the genus Panthera.

name: Dog
description: The dog is a domesticated descendant of the wolf.

name: Cat
description: Cats are very beautiful and friendly animals.

name: Panther

name: Porcupine
description: Porcupines are large rodents with coats of sharp spines, or quills, that protect them against predation.

name: Hare
description: Hares and jackrabbits are mammals belonging to the genus Lepus..

name: Hen
description: An adult female bird is called a hen, and a sexually immature female is called a pullet.

name: Fish
description: A fish is an aquatic, craniate, gill-bearing animal

name: Eagle
description: Eagle are known to hunt during the day with extraordinary vision.

name: Jackal
description: Jackals are medium-sized canids native to Africa and Eurasia.

name: Emu
description: The emu is the second-tallest living bird after the ostrich, its ratite relative.

name: Beagle
description: The beagle is a breed of small scent hound, similar in appearance to the much larger foxhound.

name: Beaver
description: Beavers are mammals known for their building skills.

name: Chameleon
description: A very talented reptile type of animal species is the Chameleon.

name: Chihuahua
description: The Chihuahua is a Mexican breed of toy dog.

name: Ibex
description: An ibex is any of several species of wild goat, distinguished by the male's large recurved horns,

name: Iguana
description: Iguana is a genus of herbivorous lizards that are native to tropical areas of Mexico, Central America, South America, and the Caribbean.

name: Llama
description: The llama is a mammal that belongs to the camel family.

name: Chinchillas
description: Chinchillas are unique-looking animals with a short body, large head, delicate limbs, large hairless ears,

name: Dodo
description: The dodo bird is an extinct bird that lived on Mauritius, a small island off the eastern coast of Africa.

name: Opossum
description: The opossums are cute wild animals found in North and South America.

name: Wombat

name: Bull

name: Meerkat
description: Meerkats live in the deserts and grasslands of the southern tip of Africa.

name: Mouse
description: Mouse is a small animal.

name: Vulture
description: A vulture is a bird of prey that scavenges on carrion.

name: Monitor lizard
description: Monitor lizards are lizards in the genus Varanus, the only extant genus in the family Varanidae.

name: Boar
description: A wild boar, also known as the wild swine or wild pig, is an omnivorous, sociable mammal considered a Least Concern species.

name: Mammoth
description: Mammoth, any member of an extinct group of elephants found as fossils in Pleistocene and Holocene deposits on several continents.

name: Gecko
description: Geckos are reptiles and are found on all the continents except Antarctica.

name: Dove
description: Columbidae is a bird family consisting of doves and pigeons.

name: Stork
description: Storks are large, long-legged, long-necked wading birds with long, stout bills.

name: Nyala
description: The lowland nyala or simply nyala, is a spiral-horned antelope native to southern Africa.

name: Vizsla

name: Uakari
description: Uakari is the common name for the New World monkeys of the genus Cacajao.

name: Dalmatian pelican
description: The Dalmatian pelican is the largest member of the pelican family, and perhaps the world's largest freshwater bird,

name: Wild turkey
description: The Wild Turkey and the Muscovy Duck are the only two domesticated birds native to the New World.

name: Gaur
description: The Indian Bison or Gaur (Bos gaurus) is the tallest species of wild cattle found in India and largest extant bovine.

name: Beetle
description: Beetles are generally characterized by a particularly hard exoskeleton and hard forewings (elytra) not usable for flying.

name: canary
description: The canary is a small bird known for its singing.

name: ox
description: a bovine, trained and used as a draft animal.

name: calf
description: A calf is a young domestic cow or bull.

name: Caterpillar
description: Caterpillars are eaten by many animals. The European pied flycatcher is one species that preys upon caterpillars.

name: Clam
description: Clam is a common name for several kinds of bivalve molluscs.

name: Cockroach
description: a flattened oval body, long threadlike antennae, and a shining black or brown leathery integument.

name: Cocoon
description: A cocoon is a covering or case made by some animals to protect themselves or their young as they develop into adults.

name: zebu
description: Although B. taurus breeds are more precocious, Zebu cattle are extensively used in the tropics, due to their thermo tolerance and resistance to parasites.

name: yak
description: The wild yak (Bos mutus) is a large, wild bovine native to the Himalayas.

name: Cricket
description: Cricket are small to medium-sized insects with mostly cylindrical, somewhat vertically flattened bodies.

name: Ladybug
description: Ladybugs are small and usually quite round in shape.

name: Sea urchin
description: Sea urchins are small sea animals that have spherical shells called tests that are typically covered in spines similar to those of a porcupine.

name: Slug
description: Snails are gastropods with a coiled shell large enough for the animal to pull back inside.

name: Starfish
description: Starfish or sea stars are star-shaped echinoderms belonging to the class Asteroidea.

name: ferret
description: The ferret is a small, domesticated species belonging to the family Mustelidae

name: chick
description: The chicken is a domesticated species that arose from the red junglefowl, originally from Southeast Asia.

name: coral snake
description: SCoral snakes are a large group of elapid snakes that can be divided into two distinct groups,

description: The gharial is one of only two species in the Gavialidae family.

name: Hermit Crab
description: The hermit crab is a type of crab that does not have a hard shell.

name: Woodpecker
description: A female European green woodpecker perches on a piece of wood.

name: Walrus
description: The walrus is a large marine mammal known for its distinctive tusks, flippers, and thick blubber, found primarily in Arctic and sub-Arctic regions.

name: Toucan
description: Toucans are among the noisiest of forest birds; their repertoire includes loud barks, bugling calls, and harsh croaks.

name: Reindeer

name: Puffin

name: Okapi
description: The okapi is a shy animal that lives among dense cover and avoids people.

name: Nilgai
description: Nilgai is the Hindustani word for “blue cow,” which describes the blue-gray of adult bulls.

name: Kudu
description: Kudu, or koodoo, is the Khoikhoi and seTswana name for this antelope.

name: Komodo dragon
description: They are powerful-looking reptiles with wide, flat heads, rounded snouts, bowed legs, and huge, muscular tails.

name: Kiwi
description: A kiwi is in a group of birds called ratites. These are birds that don't fly, which is one of many ways a kiwi is unusual.

name: Guanaco
description: The guanaco is a diurnal animal. These small hens live in which one male and many fish live with their children.

name: Gila monster
description: The Gila monster is one of only a few poisonous lizards in the world.

name: Frigatebird
description: Magnificent Frigatebirds are large seabirds with long, angular wings.

name: Crane
description: The crane is a tall, graceful, wading bird.

name: Cockatoo
description: This solitary bird of northeastern Australia, New Guinea, and the Aru Islands has a threadlike erectile crest.

name: Centipede
description: Centipedes are elongated segmented (metameric) creatures with one pair of legs per body segment.

name: Bongo
description: bongo, (Tragelaphus eurycerus), the largest, most colourful, and most sociable of the African forest antelopes,

name: Ape Animal
description: Monkeys and apes are both primates, which means they're both part of the human family tree.

name: Anteater
description: Anteaters are curious-looking animals.

name: Ring-tailed lemur
description: The ring-tailed lemur is a strepsirrhine primate, with a protruding muzzle and a wet nose. Top is the skull.

name: Zorse
description: A zorse is the offspring of a zebra stallion and a horse mare.

name: Pelican
description: APelicans are among the largest flying birds.

name: Fennec Fox
description: The fennec fox is the smallest of all the world's foxes, but its large ears, measuring 6 inches, appear to be on loan from a bigger relative.

name: Kookaburra
description: Kookaburras are birds that belong to the kingfisher family.

name: Manatee
description: Manatees are large, fully aquatic, mostly herbivorous marine mammals sometimes known as sea cows.

name: Puma
description: Pumas are large, secretive cats.

name: Siberian Husky
description: The Siberian Husky is a medium-sized working sled dog breed.

name: Chamois
description: A chamois is an animal with brown fur and short horns that curve backwards, native to the mountains of Europe.

name: Quetzal
description: The resplendent quetzal is a national symbol in Guatemala. Like other types of quetzal, the golden-headed quetzal has colorful feathers.

name: Star-nosed Mole
description: Star nosed moles are one of the most distinctive types of mammal.

name: Weasel
description: Weasels are mammals of the genus Mustela of the family Mustelidae.

name: Rhinos
description: Like the closely related, and larger, Indian rhinoceros, the Javan rhino has a single horn.

name: Pony
description: A pony is a type of small horse.

name: Yeti Crab
description: The yeti crab is a blind deep-sea crab with reduced eyes and long bristles on its body.

name: Wolverine
description: It is a muscular carnivore and a solitary animal.

name: Wildebeest
description: They belong to the family Bovidae, which includes true antelopes, cattle, goats, sheep, and other even-toed horned ungulates.

name: Umbrellabird
description: This bird has strong legs, short feet, acute claws, broad wings, and a thick bill.

name: Tapir
description: Tapirus is a genus of tapir which contains the living tapir species.

name: Tarsier

name: Sable
description: Sable, graceful member of the weasel family, Mustelidae, found in the forests of northern Asia and highly valued for its fur.

name: Saluki Dog

name: Saola
description: TThe reddish-brown saola is a horned animal that can be found in Asian countries like Laos and Vietnam

name: Serval
description: The serval is a wild cat native to Africa.

name: Raven
description: The common raven is a large all-black passerine bird.

name: Moth
description: Moths are a group of insects that includes all members of the order Lepidoptera that are not butterflies.

name: Aurochs
description: The aurochs (Bos primigenius) is an extinct cattle species, considered to be the wild ancestor of modern domestic cattle

name: Aye Aye
description: Aye-ayes are dark brown or black and are distinguished by a bushy tail that is larger than their body.

name: Asian Palm Civet
description: The Asian Palm Civet is considered a “Vulnerable” animal.

name: Barbet
description: barbet, any of about 80 species of tropical birds constituting the family Capitonidae (order Piciformes).

name: Marten
description: Martens are forest-dwelling and usually solitary.

name: Bulbul

name: Falcon
description: Falcons are birds of prey in the genus Falco, which includes about 40 species.

name: Ibis
description: Ibises are birds with long, slender bills that curve downward.

name: Guinea pig
description: Guinea pig, a domesticated species of South American rodent belonging to the cavy family (Caviidae).

name: Mallard
description: Mallards are dabbling, or surface-feeding, ducks because they eat by tipping underwater for food—head down, feet and tail in the air—rather than diving.

name: Gazelle
description: A gazelle is one of many antelope species in the genus Gazella.

name: Condor
description: condors are very large broad-winged soaring birds,

name: Earthworm
description: An earthworm is a soil-dwelling terrestrial invertebrate that belongs to the phylum Annelida. T

name: Earwig
description: The common earwig is an omnivore, eating plants and ripe fruit as well as actively hunting arthropods.

name: Fangtooth
description: Fangtooths are beryciform fish of the family Anoplogastridae that live in the deep sea.

name: Indri
description: The indri is a vertical clinger and leaper and thus holds its body upright when traveling through trees or resting in branches.

name: Insects
description: They are the largest group within the arthropod phylum.

name: Jacana
description: The jacanas are a group of tropical waders in the family Jacanidae.

name: Crow
description: The crow is a highly intelligent and adaptable bird known for its black plumage, cawing calls, and widespread distribution across various habitats.
